## Task 1: Creating an Agglomerative Hierarchical Clustering

For Task 1, use hierarchical clustering by complete linkage to create a dendrogram showing multivariate clustering for water chemistry by site,

To perform hierarchical clustering by site, youâ€™ll want to make a data frame that has a single summary row per site (e.g. based on means from all observations at that site), then calculate the euclidean distance before performing complete linkage agglomerative hierarchical clustering. 


```{r}
#reading in the data

stream_data <- read.csv(here("data", "sbc_lter_registered_stream_chemistry.csv"))

stream_data_tidy <- stream_data %>%
  replace_with_na_all(condition = ~ .x == -999.0)

```
